2. **Input bindings** - All inputs update state and trigger actions
3. **Dropdown/select** - Options populated, change handlers work
4. **Checkbox/toggle** - State persists, affects behavior
5. **Modals/dialogs** - Open/close work, backdrop clicks
6. **Status indicators** - Loading states, error states shown correctly
7. **Data flow** - UI updates when data changes

Check files:
- splice-plugin/index.html (find all buttons, inputs, selects)
- splice-plugin/js/main.js (verify handlers exist)
- splice-plugin/js/settings.js
- splice-plugin/js/multitrack.js
- splice-cep/panel/index.html
- splice-cep/panel/js/main.js

Report any UI elements that are:
- Missing handlers
- Not updating correctly
- Have broken bindings

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>SPLICE</title>
  <style>
    body {
      font-family: Adobe Clean, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif;
      background: #323232;
      color: #e1e1e1;
      margin: 0;
      padding: 8px;
      height: 100vh;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      overflow-y: auto;
      overflow-x: hidden;
    }

    /* Header */
    .header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .header h1 {
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin: 0;
    }
    .header-actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 4px;
    }
    .icon-btn {
      background: transparent;
      border: 1px solid #555;
      color: #aaa;
      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 12px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
    }
    .icon-btn:hover {
      background: #444;
      color: #fff;
    }

    /* Credit Badge */
    .credit-badge {
      display: none;
      align-items: center;
      font-size: 10px;
      font-weight: 500;
      padding: 3px 8px;
      border-radius: 10px;
      background: #1e1e1e;
      border: 1px solid #444;
      color: #aaa;
      margin-right: 8px;
    }
    .credit-badge.ok {
      color: #4a9eff;
      border-color: #4a9eff33;
    }
    .credit-badge.low {
      color: #dc3545;
      border-color: #dc354533;
      animation: pulse-low 2s infinite;
    }
    .credit-badge.error {
      color: #ff9800;
      border-color: #ff980033;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .credit-badge.error:hover {
      background: #332200;
      border-color: #ff9800;
    }
    .credit-badge.login {
      color: #888;
      border-color: #44444433;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .credit-badge.login:hover {
      background: #333;
      border-color: #666;
    }
    @keyframes pulse-low {
      0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
      50% { opacity: 0.6; }
    }

    /* Collapsed state for collapsible sections */
    .collapsed {
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* J-Cut slider styles */
    .jcut-options input[type="range"] {
      height: 4px;
      border-radius: 2px;
      background: #444;
    }

    /* Status bar */
    #status {
      padding: 6px 10px;
      background: #1e1e1e;
      border-radius: 4px;
      font-size: 11px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    /* Action Cards Container */
    .action-cards {
      display: flex;
      gap: 8px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    /* Action Card */
    .action-card {
      flex: 1;
      background: #2a2a2a;
      border-radius: 6px;
      padding: 12px;
      border: 1px solid #444;
    }
    .action-card h2 {
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin: 0 0 10px 0;
      color: #ccc;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    /* GO Button */
    .go-btn {
      width: 100%;
      padding: 14px 12px;
      font-size: 13px;
      font-weight: 700;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a9eff, #2d7dd2);
      border: none;
      border-radius: 6px;
      color: white;
      cursor: pointer;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
    }
    .go-btn:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5aa8ff, #3d8de2);
    }
    .go-btn:disabled {
      opacity: 0.5;
      cursor: not-allowed;
    }
    .go-btn.takes-btn {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #28a745, #1e7e34);
    }
    .go-btn.takes-btn:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #34ce57, #28a745);
    }

    /* Options Toggle */
    .options-toggle {
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      color: #888;
      font-size: 10px;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 4px 0;
      width: 100%;
      text-align: left;
      margin: 0;
    }
    .options-toggle:hover {
      color: #aaa;
    }
    .options-toggle::before {
      content: '+';
      margin-right: 4px;
      font-weight: bold;
    }
    .options-toggle.expanded::before {
      content: '-';
    }

    /* Options Panel (collapsible) */
    .options-panel {
      margin-top: 8px;
      padding-top: 8px;
      border-top: 1px solid #444;
    }
    .options-panel.collapsed {
      display: none;
    }

    /* Slider */
    .slider-container {
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
    .slider-container sp-slider {
      width: 100%;
    }
    .slider-labels {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      font-size: 9px;
      color: #666;
      margin-top: 2px;
    }

    /* Audio Source */
    .audio-source-group {
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .audio-source-group sp-label {
      display: block;
      font-size: 10px;
      color: #888;
      margin-bottom: 4px;
    }
    .audio-source-group sp-checkbox {
      display: block;
      margin: 4px 0;
      font-size: 11px;
    }
    .tier-badge {
      font-size: 8px;
      background: #4a9eff;
      color: white;
      padding: 1px 4px;
      border-radius: 2px;
      margin-left: 4px;
      vertical-align: middle;
    }

    /* Results Area */
    .results-area {
      background: #1e1e1e;
      border-radius: 6px;
      padding: 12px;
      min-height: 60px;
    }
    .results-area.hidden {
      display: none;
    }
    .results-header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .results-header h3 {
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin: 0;
      color: #aaa;
      text-transform: uppercase;
    }
    .undo-btn {
      background: #dc3545;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      padding: 4px 10px;
      border-radius: 3px;
      font-size: 10px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .undo-btn:hover {
      background: #c82333;
    }

    /* Progress */
    .progress-container {
      text-align: center;
      padding: 16px 0;
    }
    .progress-container sp-progressbar {
      width: 100%;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .progress-text {
      font-size: 11px;
      color: #888;
    }

    /* Results Content */
    .results-content {
      font-size: 11px;
    }
    .results-stat {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      padding: 4px 0;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #333;
    }
    .results-stat:last-child {
      border-bottom: none;
    }
    .results-stat-label {
      color: #888;
    }
    .results-stat-value {
      font-weight: 600;
      color: #4a9eff;
    }

    /* Preview Section */
    .preview-section {
      display: none;
    }
    .preview-header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
    .preview-header h3 {
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin: 0;
      color: #aaa;
      text-transform: uppercase;
    }
    .preview-header-actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 4px;
    }
    .preview-summary {
      font-size: 10px;
      color: #888;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      padding: 8px;
      background: #252525;
      border-radius: 4px;
    }
    .preview-summary strong {
      color: #4a9eff;
    }
    .preview-list {
      max-height: 180px;
      overflow-y: auto;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      contain: layout style paint;
      will-change: scroll-position;
    }
    .preview-item {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      padding: 8px 10px;
      min-height: 44px;
      margin-bottom: 4px;
      background: #2a2a2a;
      border-radius: 4px;
      border-left: 3px solid #4a9eff;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: background-color 0.15s ease, border-left-color 0.15s ease;
      contain: layout style;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
    .preview-item:hover {
      background: #333;
    }
    .preview-item:focus-within {
      outline: 2px solid #4a9eff;
      outline-offset: -2px;
    }
    .preview-item.excluded {
      opacity: 0.65;
      border-left-color: #666;
    }
    .preview-item-check {
      min-width: 20px;
      min-height: 20px;
      margin-right: 10px;
      accent-color: #4a9eff;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .preview-item-info {
      flex: 1;
      min-width: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
    .preview-item-time {
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 500;
      color: #e1e1e1;
      white-space: nowrap;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-overflow: ellipsis;
    }
    .preview-item-duration {
      font-size: 9px;
      color: #999;
      margin-top: 2px;
    }
    .preview-item-seek {
      background: transparent;
      border: 1px solid #555;
      color: #888;
      min-width: 32px;
      min-height: 32px;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 12px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      flex-shrink: 0;
    }
    .preview-item-seek:hover {
      background: #444;
      color: #fff;
    }
    .preview-item-seek:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid #4a9eff;
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }
    .preview-item-seek.loading {
      pointer-events: none;
      opacity: 0.6;
    }
    .preview-actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 8px;
      margin-top: 10px;
    }
    .preview-actions button {
      flex: 1;
      padding: 12px 10px;
      min-height: 44px;
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 600;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .apply-btn {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #28a745, #1e7e34);
      color: white;
      border: none;
    }
    .apply-btn:hover {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #34ce57, #28a745);
    }
    .apply-btn:disabled {
      opacity: 0.5;
      cursor: not-allowed;
    }
    .apply-btn:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid #28a745;
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }
    .cancel-btn {
      background: transparent;
      color: #888;
      border: 1px solid #555;
    }
    .cancel-btn:hover {
      background: #333;
      color: #e1e1e1;
    }
    .cancel-btn:focus-visible {
      outline: 2px solid #888;
      outline-offset: 2px;
    }
    .select-all-row {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      padding: 6px 0;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #333;
    }
    .select-all-row label {
      font-size: 10px;
      color: #888;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .select-all-row input {
      margin-right: 6px;
      min-width: 16px;
      min-height: 16px;
      accent-color: #4a9eff;
    }
    .preview-filters {
      display: flex;
      gap: 4px;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .filter-btn {
      background: #1e1e1e;
      border: 1px solid #444;
      color: #888;
      padding: 4px 8px;
      font-size: 9px;
      border-radius: 3px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .filter-btn:hover {
      background: #333;
      color: #e1e1e1;
    }
    .filter-btn.active {
      background: #4a9eff22;
      border-color: #4a9eff;
      color: #4a9eff;
    }

    /* Legend dots */
    .legend-item {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      margin-right: 12px;
    }
    .legend-dot {
      display: inline-block;
      width: 8px;
      height: 8px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      margin-right: 4px;
    }
    .legend-dot.silence {
      background: #dc3545;
    }
    .legend-dot.take {
      background: #4a9eff;
    }

    /* Colored markers for preview items */
    .preview-item.silence-marker {
      border-left-color: #dc3545;
    }
    .preview-item.take-marker {
      border-left-color: #4a9eff;
    }
    .preview-item.protected-silence {
      border-left-color: #ffc107;
      opacity: 0.6;
    }
    .preview-item.protected-silence::after {
      content: 'Protected';
      font-size: 8px;
      color: #ffc107;
      margin-left: 8px;
    }

    /* Repetition Highlighting Colors */
    .repetition-phrase {
      display: inline;
      padding: 2px 4px;
      border-radius: 3px;
      margin: 1px;
      font-size: 10px;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: opacity 0.2s;
    }
    .repetition-phrase:hover {
      opacity: 0.8;
    }
    .repetition-phrase.selected {
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px #fff;
    }
    .repetition-color-1 { background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.4); color: #ff6b6b; }
    .repetition-color-2 { background: rgba(78, 205, 196, 0.4); color: #4ecdc4; }
    .repetition-color-3 { background: rgba(255, 230, 109, 0.4); color: #ffe66d; }
    .repetition-color-4 { background: rgba(149, 225, 211, 0.4); color: #95e1d3; }
    .repetition-color-5 { background: rgba(155, 89, 182, 0.4); color: #9b59b6; }
    .repetition-color-6 { background: rgba(241, 196, 15, 0.4); color: #f1c40f; }
    .stutter-word {
      background: rgba(220, 53, 69, 0.3);
      color: #dc3545;
      text-decoration: line-through;
    }
    .color-chip {
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 4px;
      padding: 2px 6px;
      border-radius: 3px;
      font-size: 9px;
    }
    .color-chip .chip-dot {
      width: 8px;
      height: 8px;
      border-radius: 50%;
    }

    /* Take Items */
    .takes-list {
      max-height: 200px;
      overflow-y: auto;
    }
    .take-item {
      padding: 8px;
      margin-bottom: 4px;
      background: #2a2a2a;
      border-radius: 4px;
      border-left: 3px solid #555;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: all 0.15s ease;
    }
    .take-item:hover {
      background: #333;
    }
    .take-item.best {
      border-left-color: #28a745;
      background: #1a2e1a;
    }
    .take-header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
    }
    .take-label {
      font-weight: 500;
      font-size: 11px;
    }
    .take-star {
      font-size: 14px;
      color: #555;
    }
    .take-item.best .take-star {
      color: #28a745;
    }
    .take-time {
      color: #888;
      font-size: 9px;
      margin-top: 2px;
    }
    .take-text {
      color: #aaa;
      font-size: 10px;
      margin-top: 4px;
    }
    .take-actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 6px;
      margin-top: 10px;
    }
    .take-actions button {
      flex: 1;
      padding: 8px;
      font-size: 10px;
      border-radius: 4px;
    }
    .keep-best-btn {
      background: #28a745;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .keep-best-btn:hover {
      background: #218838;
    }
    .label-all-btn {
      background: #6c757d;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    .label-all-btn:hover {
      background: #5a6268;
    }

    /* Empty State */
    .empty-state {
      text-align: center;
      color: #666;
      font-size: 11px;
      padding: 20px 0;
    }

    /* Razor Section (Advanced - hidden by default) */
    .advanced-section {
      margin-top: 10px;
      padding: 10px;
      background: #252525;
      border-radius: 4px;
      border: 1px dashed #444;
    }
    .advanced-section.hidden {
      display: none;
    }
    .advanced-section h4 {
      font-size: 10px;
      color: #888;
      margin: 0 0 8px 0;
      text-transform: uppercase;
    }
    .advanced-section p {
      font-size: 9px;
      color: #666;
      margin: 0 0 8px 0;
    }
    .advanced-section button {
      font-size: 10px;
      padding: 6px 10px;
      margin-right: 6px;
    }
    button.razor-btn {
      background: #6f42c1;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 3px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    button.razor-btn:hover {
      background: #5a32a3;
    }
    button.export-xml-btn {
      background: #17a2b8;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 3px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    button.export-xml-btn:hover {
      background: #138496;
    }

    /* Settings Modal */
    .modal {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      z-index: 100;
    }
    .modal.hidden {
      display: none;
    }
    .modal-content {
      background: #2a2a2a;
      border-radius: 8px;
      padding: 16px;
      width: 90%;
      max-width: 280px;
      border: 1px solid #444;
    }
    .modal-header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      margin-bottom: 12px;
    }
    .modal-header h3 {
      font-size: 12px;
      margin: 0;
    }
    .modal-close {
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      color: #888;
      font-size: 18px;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 0;
      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;
    }
    .modal-close:hover {
      color: #fff;
    }
    .setting-group {
      margin-bottom: 12px;
    }
    .setting-group label {
      display: block;
      font-size: 10px;
      color: #888;
      margin-bottom: 4px;
    }

    /* Preset Modal Styles */
    .preset-icon-option {
      color: #888;
      transition: all 0.15s ease;
    }
    .preset-icon-option:hover {
      background: #333 !important;
      color: #e1e1e1;
    }
    .preset-icon-option.selected {
      border-color: #4a9eff !important;
      background: #4a9eff22 !important;
      color: #4a9eff;
    }

    /* Preset List Item Styles */
    .preset-list-item {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      padding: 8px 10px;
      margin-bottom: 4px;
      background: #2a2a2a;
      border-radius: 4px;
      border-left: 3px solid #444;
    }
    .preset-list-item:hover {
      background: #333;
    }
    .preset-list-item.built-in {
      border-left-color: #4a9eff;
      opacity: 0.7;
    }
    .preset-list-item.custom {
      border-left-color: #28a745;
    }
    .preset-list-item-icon {
      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      background: #1e1e1e;
      border-radius: 4px;
      font-size: 12px;
      margin-right: 10px;
      color: #888;
    }
    .preset-list-item-info {
      flex: 1;
      min-width: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
    .preset-list-item-name {
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 500;
      color: #e1e1e1;
      white-space: nowrap;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-overflow: ellipsis;
    }
    .preset-list-item-desc {
      font-size: 9px;
      color: #888;
      white-space: nowrap;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-overflow: ellipsis;
    }
    .preset-list-item-actions {
      display: flex;
      gap: 4px;
    }
    .preset-list-item-actions button {
      background: transparent;
      border: 1px solid #555;
      color: #888;
      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 10px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }
    .preset-list-item-actions button:hover {
      background: #444;
      color: #e1e1e1;
    }
    .preset-list-item-actions button.delete:hover {
      background: #dc3545;
      border-color: #dc3545;
      color: white;
    }

    /* Multitrack Section Styles */
    .multitrack-section {
      margin-top: 10px;
      padding: 10px;
      background: #252525;
      border-radius: 4px;
      border: 1px solid #444;
    }
    .multitrack-section.hidden {
      display: none;
    }
    .section-toggle {
      width: 100%;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      color: #e1e1e1;
      font-size: 11px;
      font-weight: 600;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 0;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .section-toggle:hover {
      color: #4a9eff;
    }
    .section-toggle .toggle-icon {
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: bold;
    }

        <div class="takes-detection-group" style="margin-top: 8px; padding-top: 8px; border-top: 1px solid #444;">
